availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Melear Gordan on July 19, 1832. Father of Catharine Gordan, Harvery Gordan, and Mary J. Gordan. Farmer in Anderson County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 227; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 474; Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, film no. 001550673, Anderson County, Kentucky, July 19, 1832.
